title: Can we get more content available to purchase with IP.
body:
_"TL;DR: Too much **IP** left over is building up to a silly amount.
 No champs, runes or pages left to be bought with** IP**. 
Changed name numerous times with** IP**, settled on a good one. 
There is nothing left to spend **IP** on until the next champ release, Give us **IP** content please."_

Hey Everyone,
I've been a player since Season 2.
I'm one of "_those people_"... I have all of the champs, 20 rune pages and every rune.
**My IP is basically just growing into a beast...**

Waiting for the next champion to be released, so I can purchase it outright with my** IP**.
After several name changes, I can safely say I'm happy with my current summoner name.

What else can "_those people_" do with their **IP**?
Nothing. Nothing at all...

I feel chromas would be great if purchasable with **IP**.
Maybe for 15600** IP**? That's the price of two new release champions.
Maybe you could get some Ward Skins or even Summoner Icons into the **IP** price Range. like 15600 **IP** for a Ward Skin and maybe like you did once with Harrowing ward skins, you could make it a "rental" on the ward skin.
7800 **IP** get's you 2 weeks hire. So you don't get to keep it, but use it for 2 weeks.

With Icons you could do a new set of Icons, that can only be bought with** IP**... ones you have to earn through** IP**.

Just a thought.
Would like to be able to use this mass build up of **IP**.
Thanks for reading. 
xo

Lol Riot would never do a conversion of IP to RP. I mean the main reason RP was made was so that players would actually spend some cash on premium points that can purchase things that you can't get for just playing (_"Playing League of Legends is FREE"_  lmao). This applies to all games; they all have some sort of premium credit that require you to use money to help your game be easier. For League it's a bit different in the sense that RP won't actually help win your games (cept for the theory that some skins make your skillshot hitboxes bigger??) but even then RP sales would diminish drastically. From Riot's POV it would be an unnecessary change they would have to make.
I fully support the idea; I am not bursting with IP but it would be a nice feeling to change some of your eventually worthless IP into RP for cool aesthtics but Rito will never agree unless it's like a HUGE conversion
